timeline.bodyText:
Since this method is only used by TableFunction, I'd like not to add this method in the class. How about add it in PythonTableFunctionRunner.
Same for toTableProtoType.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText:
It's not good to cast here. It's better to change the method from toFlinkTableTypeSerializer(LogicalType logicalType) to toFlinkTableTypeSerializer(RowType logicalType)
Same for toTableProtoType.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Do we have any other TableFunctionSerializers beside RowTableFunctionSerializer? For example, TupleTableFunctionSerializer. If there no other serializers, I'd like not to add this abstract class. Instead, simply add RowTableFunctionSerializer extends from TypeSerializer would be ok. What do you think?
timeline.author: hequn8128

replies.bodyText: I will add BaseRowTableFunctionSerializer extends from TableFunctionSerializers in next pr.
replies.author: HuangXingBo

replies.bodyText: After rebase the pr FLINK-15897, I think we can remove the TableFunctionSerializer.Because we can decide whether the message is finish message according to the length and content of  the message byte array.
replies.author: HuangXingBo

timeline.bodyText: This method has not been overrided by the child class RowTableFunctionSerializer. Once we have multi child classes, the equals method would be wrong, for example, a RowTableFunctionSerializer will equal to a TupleTableFunctionSerializer if they share the same filed serializers.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Add some comments for this method. It would be quite helpful for other ones to understand.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Copy the input Row before putting into the queue if getExecutionConfig().isObjectReuseEnabled() returns true
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: This class is copied from PythonScalarFunctionOperator. I think we can do some code reuse.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Please try to avoid code deduplication. For example, we can add a StatelessFunctionOperator and put the same code in this class. What do you think?
timeline.author: hequn8128
